overview: Hussain, a jovial patient, seems at home in his hospital room. Bedridden with a chronic illness, he uses his pocket tape recorder to voice his thoughts. He understands his time is near and seems to be at peace with it. When a brash, angry, young man Khalid is shifted to his room, he starts feeling protective towards him. With his life coming to an end, he makes a crucial decision – a decision that will give Khalid a second chance at life.
title: Voice note
